titles: A proclamation for calling a Convention of Estates
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His Most Sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of sheet; initial letter.

Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
